DOC.brief_summary: Plasmin is expected to create a posterior vitreous detachment (PVD) when injected directly into the eye. The pharmacological creation of a PVD may be beneficial in helping to treat a variety of conditions.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Plasmin for the Creation of a Posterior Vitreous Detachment (PVD)
DOC.criteria: Patients who are in need of a vitrectomy. A PVD in the study eye as assessed by the investigator using ophthalmic and alternative examination techniques. A history of vitrectomy in the study eye. A media opacity that precludes quality examination of the vitreous and fundus in the study eye.
